entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING, Lorraine
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:52 p.m. EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Freezing Drizzle, -1.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Montréal-Mirabel Int'l Airport 12:00 AM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023
Condition: Light Freezing Drizzle
Temperature: -1.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa falling
Visibility: 16 km
Humidity: 97 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -1.4°C
Wind: NE 14 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Wednesday night: Freezing rain or ice pellets. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Ice pellets changing to freezing rain this evening then to rain after midnight. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 7 this evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of rain. High 10.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending near noon then clearing. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. High 10. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
